task.name: hif_editimlist
task.shortdescription: Add to a list of images to be produced with hif_makeimages()
task.description:
Add to a list of images to be produced with hif_makeimages(), which uses hif_tclean() to invoke CASA tclean. Many of the hif_editimlist() inputs map directly to tclean parameters.
If pipeline mode is 'getinputs' then None is returned. Otherwise the results object for the pipeline task is returned.

param.name: imagename
param.description: Prefix for output image names.

param.name: search_radius_arcsec
param.description: Size of the field finding beam search radius in arcsec.

param.name: cell
param.shortdescription: Image X and Y cell size(s) with units or pixels per beam
param.description: Image X and Y cell size(s) with units or pixels per beam. Single value same for both. \'<number>ppb\' for pixels per beam. Compute cell size based on the UV coverage of all the fields to be imaged and use a 5 pix per beam sampling. The pix per beam specification uses the above default cell size ('5ppb') and scales it accordingly. example: ['0.5arcsec', '0.5arcsec'] '3ppb'

param.name: cfcache
param.description: Convolution function cache directory name

param.name: conjbeams
param.description: Use conjugate frequency in tclean for wideband A-terms.

param.name: cyclefactor
param.description: Controls the depth of clean in minor cycles based on PSF.

param.name: cycleniter
param.description: Controls max number of minor cycle iterations in a single major cycle.

param.name: datacolumn
param.description: Data column to image

param.name: deconvolver
param.description: Minor cycle algorithm (multiscale or mtmfs)

param.name: editmode
param.description: The edit mode of the task (e.g. add, edit). Defaults to 'add'.

param.name: field
param.description: Set of data selection field names or ids.

param.name: imaging_mode
param.description: Identity of product type (e.g. VLASS quick look) desired. This will determine the heuristics used.

param.name: imsize
param.description: Image X and Y size(s) in pixels or PB level (single fields), \'\' for default. Single value same for both. \'<number>pb\' for PB level.

param.name: intent
param.description: Set of data selection intents

param.name: gridder
param.description: Name of the gridder to use with tclean

param.name: mask
param.description: Used to declare whether to use a predefined mask for tclean.

param.name: nbin
param.description: Channel binning factor.

param.name: nchan
param.description: Number of channels, -1 = all

param.name: niter
param.description: The max total number of minor cycle iterations allowed for tclean

param.name: nterms
param.description: Number of Taylor coefficients in the spectral model

param.name: parameter_file
param.description: keyword=value text file as alternative method of input parameters

param.name: pblimit
param.description: PB gain level at which to cut off normalizations

param.name: phasecenter
param.shortdescription: Image center (direction or field index, \'\' for default)
param.description: The default phase center is set to the mean of the field directions of all fields that are to be image together. example: 0, 'J2000 19h30m00 -40d00m00'

param.name: reffreq
param.description: Reference frequency of the output image coordinate system

param.name: restfreq
param.description: List of rest frequencies or a rest frequency in a string for output image.

param.name: robust
param.description: Briggs robustness parameter for tclean

param.name: scales
param.description: The scales for multi-scale imaging.

param.name: specmode
param.description: Spectral gridding type (mfs, cont, cube, \'\' for default)

param.name: spw
param.description: Set of data selection spectral window/channels, \'\' for all

param.name: start
param.shortdescription: First channel for frequency mode images.
param.description: First channel for frequency mode images. Starts at first input channel of the spw. example: '22.3GHz'

param.name: stokes
param.description: Stokes Planes to make

param.name: threshold
param.description: Stopping threshold (number in units of Jy, or string)

param.name: nsigma
param.description: Multiplicative factor for rms-based threshold stopping

param.name: uvtaper
param.description: Used to set a uv-taper during clean.

param.name: uvrange
param.description: Set of data selection uv ranges, \'\' for all.

param.name: width
param.description: Channel width

param.name: pipelinemode
param.description: The pipeline operating mode. In 'automatic' mode the pipeline determines the values of all context defined pipeline inputs automatically. In 'interactive' mode the user can set the pipeline context defined parameters manually. In 'getinputs' mode the user can check the settings of all pipeline parameters without running the task.

param.name: dryrun
param.description: Run the task (False) or display the command(True)

param.name: acceptresults
param.description: Add the results to the pipeline context
